Script.name: Player Widget
Script.script: function ui.fInitPlayerWidget() -- -- Player GUI.Player = Adjustable.Container:new2({ name = "GUI.Player", x = 0, y = 0, width = 300, height = 150, titleText ="Player", titleTxtColor = "orange", buttonsize = 12, buttonFontSize = 5, adjLabelstyle = GUI.CSS.AC, buttonstyle = GUI.CSS.ACButtons, }) -- -- Player Level GUI.Player.Level = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Level", x = -60, y = 2, width = 25, height = 25, fontSize = 8, }, GUI.Player) GUI.Player.Level:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.Level); GUI.Player.Level:enableClickthrough() -- -- Main GUI.Player.Main = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Main", x = 3, y = 25, width = "100%-6", height = "100%-28", }, GUI.Player) GUI.Player.Main:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.BorderPlayer..[[ background-color: rgba(30,24,24); ]]); -- -- Experience GUI.Player.Main.Experience = Geyser.Gauge:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Main.Experience", x = 8, y = 10, width = -5, height = 6, },GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Experience:setValue(0, 100) -- GUI.Player.Main.Experience.front:echo("") -- GUI.Player.Main.Experience.back:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeBack..[[ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); ]]) -- GUI.Player.Main.Experience.front:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeFront..[[ background-color: purple; ]]) -- -- Player Health Gauges GUI.Player.Main.Health = Geyser.Gauge:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Main.Health", x = 8, y = 15, width = -5, height = "40%-10", },GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Health:setValue(0, 100) -- GUI.Player.Main.Health.back:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeBack..[[ background-color: rgba(150, 0, 0, 0.3); ]]) -- GUI.Player.Main.Health.front:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeFront..[[ background-color: QLinearGradient( x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #ee0000, stop: 0.65 #990000, stop: 1 #bb0000); ]]) GUI.Player.Main.Health.front:echo("Vita") -- -- GUI.Player.Main.Health.dif = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Main.Health.dif", x = 0, y = 0, width = "10", height = "10", }, GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Health.dif:setFontSize(5) -- -- Tick GUI.Player.Main.Tick = Geyser.Gauge:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Main.Tick", x = 8, y = "40%+4", width = -5, height = 6, }, GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Tick:setValue(0, 75) -- GUI.Player.Main.Tick.back:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeBack..[[ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); ]]) -- GUI.Player.Main.Tick.front:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeFront..[[ background-color: grey; ]]) -- -- Player Mana Gauges GUI.Player.Main.Mana = Geyser.Gauge:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Main.Mana", x = 8, y = "40%+10", width = -5, height = "20%-5", },GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Mana:setValue(0, 100) -- GUI.Player.Main.Mana.back:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeBack..[[ background-color: rgba(0, 0, 150, .3); ]]) -- GUI.Player.Main.Mana.front:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeFront..[[ background-color: QLinearGradient( x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #0000ee, stop: 0.65 #000099, stop: 1 #0000bb); ]]) GUI.Player.Main.Mana.front:echo("Mana") -- -- Player Stamina Gauges (used for moviment) GUI.Player.Main.Stamina = Geyser.Gauge:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Main.Stamina", x = 8, y = "60%+5", width = -5, height = "20%-5", },GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Stamina:setValue(0, 100) -- GUI.Player.Main.Stamina.back:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeBack..[[ background-color: rgba(0, 150, 0, .2); ]]) -- GUI.Player.Main.Stamina.front:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeFront..[[ background-color: QLinearGradient( x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #00aa00, stop: 0.65 #006600, stop: 1 #008800); ]]) GUI.Player.Main.Stamina.front:echo("Movimento") -- -- Player Power Gauges GUI.Player.Main.Power = Geyser.Gauge:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Power", x = 8, y = "80%", width = -5, height = "20%-5", },GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Power:setValue(0, 100) -- GUI.Player.Main.Power.back:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeBack..[[ background-color: rgba(204, 85, 0, .2); ]]) -- GUI.Player.Main.Power.front:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GaugeFront..[[ background-color: QLinearGradient( x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #ffa500, stop: 0.65 #e86100, stop: 1 #ff8c00); ]]) GUI.Player.Main.Power.front:echo("Potenza") -- -- Player Gem GUI.Player.Main.Gem = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.Player.Gem", x = 0, y = 0, width = 28, height = 28, }, GUI.Player.Main) GUI.Player.Main.Gem:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.GemEmpty); -- -- Wrapping function local Minimize = GUI.Player.minimize local Restore = GUI.Player.restore -- function GUI.Player:minimize(...) GUI.Player.Main:hide() return Minimize(GUI.Player) end -- function GUI.Player:restore(...) GUI.Player.Main:show() return Restore(GUI.Player) end end

Script.name: Public Chat Widget
Script.script: function ui.fInitPublicChatWidget() -- -- Public messages GUI.PublicChat = Adjustable.Container:new2({ name = "GUI.PublicChat", x = 1240, y = 275, width = 300, height = 265, titleText ="Canale pubblico", titleTxtColor = "orange", buttonsize = 12, buttonFontSize = 5, adjLabelstyle = GUI.CSS.AC, buttonstyle = GUI.CSS.ACButtons, }) -- -- Add Border and Main ui.fAddMain(GUI.PublicChat, GUI.CSS.Border, GUI.CSS.Main) -- -- Console GUI.PublicChat.Main.Console = Geyser.MiniConsole:new2({ name = 'GUI.PublicChat.Main.Console', x=0, y=0, width = "100%", height = "100%", autoWrap = true, scrollBar = true, }, GUI.PublicChat.Main) GUI.PublicChat.Main.Console:setColor(30, 24, 24) GUI.PublicChat.Main.Console:setBgColor(30, 24, 24) GUI.PublicChat.Main.Console:setFontSize(ui.parameters.fsPublicChat) -- -- Wrapping function local Minimize = GUI.PublicChat.minimize local Restore = GUI.PublicChat.restore -- function GUI.PublicChat:minimize(...) GUI.PublicChat.Main:hide() return Minimize(GUI.PublicChat) end -- function GUI.PublicChat:restore(...) GUI.PublicChat.Main:show() return Restore(GUI.PublicChat) end end

Script.name: Target Buttons Widget
Script.script: function ui.fInitTargetButtonsWidget() -- -- Target GUI.TargetButtons = Adjustable.Container:new2({ name = "GUI.TargetButtons", x = 1240, y = 540, width = 300, height = 120, titleText ="Target", titleTxtColor = "orange", buttonsize = 12, buttonFontSize = 5, adjLabelstyle = GUI.CSS.AC, buttonstyle = GUI.CSS.ACButtons, }) -- -- Add Border and Main ui.fAddMain(GUI.TargetButtons, GUI.CSS.Border, GUI.CSS.Main) -- -- Target buttons GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t1 = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t1", x = 0, y = 0, width = "50%-2", height = "50%-2", },GUI.TargetButtons.Main) -- GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t2 = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t2", x = "50%+2", y = 0, width = "50%-2", height = "50%-2", },GUI.TargetButtons.Main) -- GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t3 = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t3", x = 0, y = "50%", width = "50%-2", height = "50%-2", },GUI.TargetButtons.Main) -- GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t4 = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t4", x = "50%+2", y = "50%+2", width = "50%-2", height = "50%-2", },GUI.TargetButtons.Main) -- for i=1,4 do GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i]:setClickCallback("ui.fExecuteTargetButton", "t"..i, nil) GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i]:setFontSize(9) GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i]:setFgColor("LightGoldenrod") -- -- Index GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].index = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t"..i..".index", x = 5, y = 1, width = "15", height = "15", }, GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i]) GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].index:setFontSize(6) GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].index:echo("t"..i.."") GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].index:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.Keybind); GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].index:enableClickthrough() -- -- Keybid GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].keybind = Geyser.Label:new2({ name = "GUI.TargetButtons.Main.t"..i..".keybind", x = 5, y = -15, width = "100%-10", height = 15, }, GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i]) GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].keybind:enableClickthrough() GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].keybind:setStyleSheet(GUI.CSS.Keybind); GUI.TargetButtons.Main["t"..i].keybind:setFontSize(ui.parameters.fsKeybind) end -- -- Wrapping function local Minimize = GUI.TargetButtons.minimize local Restore = GUI.TargetButtons.restore -- function GUI.TargetButtons:minimize(...) GUI.TargetButtons.Main:hide() return Minimize(GUI.TargetButtons) end -- function GUI.TargetButtons:restore(...) GUI.TargetButtons.Main:show() return Restore(GUI.TargetButtons) end end

Script.name: Init CSS
Init Help
Script.script:
ui.fDebug("[init] Help") -- ui.help = {} -- ui.help.error = [[ Non esiste aiuto per questa parola ]] -- ui.help.help = [[ <title>Lumen et Umbra UI Help</title> Lumen et Umbra UI comprende un insieme di componenti grafici, script, trigger, etc, creati per personalizzare l'esperienza di gioco con il MUD Lumen et Umbra.
Usare il comando <command>uih[elp] <comando></command> per avere informazioni sugli argomenti:
Comandi principali: - <command>uia[liases]</command> - Gestione <link alias>aliases</link> - <command>uib[uttons]</command> - Gestione <link button>pulsanti per alias</link> (a0..a9, b0..b9, c0..c9) - <command>uihi[ghlights]</command> - Gestione <link highlight>highlights</link> - <command>uik[eibind]</command> - Gestione <link keybind>tasti rapidi</link> per aliases e targets - <command>uip[rofiles]</command> - Gestione <link profile>profili</link> - <command>uiv[ariables]</command> - Gestione <link variable>variabili</link>
Altri comandi: - <command>.</command>/<command>..</command> - Integrazione <link walk>walk/speedwalk</link> - <command>uic[olors]</command> - Lista <link color>colori</link> disponibili per <link highlight>highlights</link> - <command>uisetf[ontsize]</command> - Gestione <link fontsize>dimensione font</link> dei widget - <command>uiw[idget]</command> - Ripristino <link widget>widget</link> chiusi
Altri argomenti: - <command>target</command> - Utilizzo della variabile <link target>Target</link> ]] -- ui.help.alias = [[ <title>Aliases</title> Gli aliases permettono di eseguire lunghi comandi digitando poche lettere. E' possibile arricchire il comando associato all'alias utilizzando le variabili create con il comando <command>uivariable</command>. E' possibile associare più comandi ad un alias utilizzando gli appositi separatori (]]..ui.cSeparator..[[;<reset> o ]]..ui.cSeparator..[[/<reset>).
<white>Configurazione:<reset> <command>uia[liases]</command> Per visualizzare l'elenco degli aliases <command>uia[liases]</command> <aliasName><alias></aliasName> Per visualizzare il singolo alias <command>uia[liases]</command> <aliasName><alias></aliasName> <command><comandi></command> Per creare o modificare un alias <command>uia[liases]</command> <aliasName><alias></aliasName> <command>remove</command> Per eliminare un alias <command>uia[liases] remove_all</command> Per eliminare tutti gli aliases
<white>Utilizzo:<reset> <aliasName><alias></aliasName> <input>[argomento]</input> Per eseguire l'alias
<white>Caratteri speciali:<reset> - <input>#</input> Parametro - ]]..ui.cVarID..ui.varID..[[<reset> Variabile - ]]..ui.cSeparator..[[;<reset> o ]]..ui.cSeparator..[[/<reset> Divisore comandi
<white>Esempio 1<reset> => <command>uia</command> <aliasName>hl</aliasName> <aliasOutput>cast 'heal'</aliasOutput>
digitando: <aliasName>hl</aliasName> eseguirà : <aliasOutput>cast 'heal'</aliasOutput>
digitando: <aliasName>hl</aliasName> <input>Pippo</input> eseguirà : <aliasOutput>cast 'heal'</aliasOutput> <input>Pippo</input>
<white>Esempio 2<reset> => <command>uia</command> <aliasName>bt</aliasName> <aliasOutput>bash</aliasOutput> <varName>target</varName> (con <varName>target</varName> = <varValue>Pluto</varValue>)
digitando: <aliasName>bt</aliasName> eseguirà : <aliasOutput>bash</aliasOutput> <varValue>Pluto</varValue>
digitando: <aliasName>bt</aliasName> <input>Pippo</input> eseguirà :<aliasOutput>bash</aliasOutput> <input>Pippo</input> (<varName>target</varName> non cambia, rimarrà <varValue>Pluto</varValue>)
<white>Esempio 3<reset> => <command>uia</command> <aliasName>aa</aliasName> <varName>action</varName> <varName>target</varName> (con <varName>action</varName> = <varValue>kick</varValue> e <varName>target</varName> = <varValue>Pluto</varValue>)
digitando: <aliasName>aa</aliasName> eseguirà : <varValue>kick</varValue> <varValue>Pluto</varValue>
digitando: <aliasName>aa</aliasName> <input>Pippo</input> eseguirà : <varValue>kick</varValue> <input>Pippo</input>
<white>Esempio 4<reset> => <command>uia</command> <aliasName>dd</aliasName> <aliasOutput>get</aliasOutput> <input>#</input> <varName>bag</varName>]]..ui.cSeparator..[[;<reset><aliasOutput>drink</aliasOutput> <input>#</input>]]..ui.cSeparator..[[;<reset><aliasOutput>put</aliasOutput> <input>#</input> <varName>bag</varName> (con <varName>bag</varName> = <varValue>moltetasche</varValue>)
digitando: <aliasName>dd</aliasName> <input>limonata</input> eseguirà : <aliasOutput>get</aliasOutput> <input>limonata</input> <varValue>moltetasche</varValue> <aliasOutput>drink</aliasOutput> <input>limonata</input> <aliasOutput>put</aliasOutput> <input>limonata</input> <varValue>moltetasche</varValue>
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.button = [[ <title>Pulsanti per alias</title> I pulsanti degli alias sono i pulsanti che posso essere personalizzati assonciandogli un alias. Sono identificati con una lettera (a, b oppure c) e un numero (da 0 a 9) per un totale di 30 pulsanti configurabili (da <button>[a0]</button> a <button>[a9]</button>, da <button>[b0]</button> a <button>[b9]</button>, da <button>[c0]</button> a <button>[c9]</button>).
<white>Configurazione:<reset> <command>uib[uttons]</command> Per visualizzare l'elenco dei pulsanti configurati <command>uib[uttons]</command> <button><button></button> Per visualizzare il singolo pulsante <command>uib[uttons]</command> <button><button></button> <aliasName><alias></aliasName> Per associare un alias al pusante <command>uib[uttons]</command> <button><button></button> <command>remove</command> Per eliminare l'alias associato al pulsante <command>uib[uttons] remove_all</command> Per eliminare gli aliases associati a tutti i pulsanti
<white>Utilizzo:<reset> <button><button></button> o click Per eseguire l'alias associato al pulsante
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.color = [[ <title>Colori</title> E' possibile visualizzare l'elenco dei colori che si possono utilizzare negli uiHilights tramite il comando <command>uiColors</command>.
<white>Utilizzo:<reset> <command>uic[olors]</command> Per visualizzare l'elenco dei colori
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.fontsize = [[ <title>Impostare la dimensione del font dei widget</title> E' possibile cambiare la dimensione del font di alcuni widget dell'UI.
<white>Utilizzo:<reset> <command>uisetf[ontsize] <nome_widget> <dimensione_font></command>
I <command><nome_widget></command> disponibili sono: <command>all</command> (per tutti contemporaneamente), <command>equipment</command>, <command>help</command>, <command>inventory</command>, <command>map</command>, <command>private</command> o <command>public</command>.
Le <command><dimensione_font></command> devono essere un valore compreso tra <varValue>1</varValue> e <varValue>30</varValue>.
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.highlight = [[ <title>Highlights</title> Gli Highlights permettono di evidenziare le parole e le frasi del mud cambiandone il colore. Questo può semplificare la visualizzazione di elementi importanti come, ad esempio, evidenziare la presenza di una <red>cassa<reset> nella descrizione di una stanza.
<white>Configurazione:<reset> <command>uihi[lights]</command> Per visualizzare l'elenco degli highlights <command>uihi[lights]</command> <testo> Per visualizzare il colore del testo <command>uihi[lights]</command> <testo> <colore> Per associare un colore a un testo <command>uihi[lights]</command> <testo> <command>remove</command> Per eliminare highlights associato al testo <command>uihi[lights] remove_all</command> Per eliminare gli aliases associati a tutti i pulsanti
Per un elenco completo dei colori disponibili, utilizzare il comando uicolors.
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.keybind = [[ <title>Tasti rapidi per aliases e target</title> E' possibile associare una combinazione di tasti a un alias o a un target con il comando <command>uikeybind</command>.
<white>Configurazione:<reset> <command>uik[eybind]</command> Per visualizzare l'elenco dei tasti rapidi <command>uik[eybind]</command> <aliasName><alias></aliasName>|<button><target></button> Per visualizzare i tasti dell'alias\del target <command>uik[eybind]</command> <aliasName><alias></aliasName>|<button><target></button> <keybind><tasti></keybind> Per associare uun tasto all'alias\al target <command>uik[eybind]</command> <aliasName><alias></aliasName>|<button><target></button> <command>remove</command> Per eliminare i tasti dell'alias\del target <command>uik[eybind] remove_all</command> Per eliminare tutti i tasti rapidi
I tasti utillizzabili possono essere i tasti funzione (<keybind>f1</keybind>, <keybind>f2</keybind>, <keybind>f3</keybind>, etc), i caratteri dell'alfabeto (<keybind>a</keybind>, <keybind>b</keybind>, <keybind>c</keybind>, etc) e i numeri (<keybind>0</keybind>, <keybind>1</keybind>, <keybind>2</keybind>, etc), presi singolarmente oppure preceduti da <keybind>CTRL</keybind> o <keybind>ALT</keybind> (oppure entrambi).
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.profile = [[ <title>Profili</title> Tramite l'utilizzo dei profili è possibile salvare alias, highlights, target e variabili
<white>Configurazione:<reset> <command>uip[rofiles]</command> Per visualizzare l'elenco dei disponibili <command>uip[rofiles] load</command> <profile><profilo></profile> Per caricare un profile <command>uip[rofiles] save</command> <profile><profilo></profile> Per salvare i dati in uso su un profilo <command>uip[rofiles] remove</command> <profile><profilo></profile> Per rimuovere un profilo <command>uip[rofiles] remove_all</command> Per eliminare tutti i profile
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.target = [[ <title>Target (g0..g9, o0, t1..t4)</title> La variable <varName>target</varName> è una variabile predefinita dell'UI di Lumen et Umbra che è possibile impostare in modi differenti. Oltre ad essere trattata come una variabile gestibile dal comando <command>uivariables</command> è possibile impostarla utilizzando o i 4 tasti target (<button>t1</button>, <button>t2</button>, <button>t3</button> e <button>t4</button>), oppure cliccando sul riquadro del nemico attualmente ingaggiato (<button>o0</button>) o ancora cliccando su uno dei componenti del gruppo di gioco (da <button>g0</button> a <button>g9</button>). I tasti <button>t1</button>, <button>t2</button>, <button>t3</button> e <button>t4</button> sono configurabili, mentre <button>o0</button> e da <button>g0</button> a <button>g9</button> sono preimpostati in base all'avversario ingaggiato e la composizione dale gruppo (l'ultima aggiornata con il comando <white>group<reset>.
<white>Configurazione:<reset> <command>t1..4</command> <valore> Per assegnare un valore a T1..T4 <command>t1..4 remove</command> Per rimuovere il valore aassegnato a T1..T4
<white>Utilizzo:<reset> <g0..9> o click Per assegnare a <varName>target</varName> un componente del gruppo <0o> o click Per assegnare a <varName>target</varName> l'avversario ingaggiato <t1..4> o click Per assegnare a <varName>target</varName> il valore assegnato a t1..4
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.variable = [[ <title>Variabili</title> E' possibile definire delle variabili (retentive) da riutilizzare negli alias. E' possibile richiamare una variabile all'interno di un alias facendo precedere al nome della variabile il carattere speciale <command>@</command>. Alcune delle variabili sono già dichiarate (variabili predefinite), e vengno utilizzate per gli elementi l'interfaccia. Le variabili sono utlizzabili nel codice dei vostri script facendo accesso alla tabella ui.variables[nomevariabile].
<white>Configurazione:<reset> <command>uiv[ariable]</command>|<command>]]..ui.varID..[[</command> Per visualizzare l'elenco delle variabili <command>uiv[ariable]</command>|<command>]]..ui.varID..[[</command> <varName><nome></varName> Per visualizzare il valore di una variabile <command>uiv[ariable]</command>|<command>]]..ui.varID..[[</command> <varName><nome></varName> <varValue><valore></varValue> Per creare o modificare una variabile <command>uiv[ariable]</command>|<command>]]..ui.varID..[[</command> <varName><nome></varName> <command>remove</command> Per rimuovere una variabile <command>uiv[ariable]</command>|<command>]]..ui.varID..[[</command> <command>remove_all</command> Per rimuovere tutte le variabili
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.walk = [[ <title>Walk, Speedwalk e Backwalk</title> Lumen et Umbra UI comprende uno strumento per la gestione dei movimenti del personaggio. Tramite i comandi "<command>.</command>" e "<command>..</command>" è possibile percorrere lunghi <percorsi> espressi, per esempio, nel formato "ee2w4suuu9n" oltre che ripercorrere i propri passi.
<white>Utilizzo:<reset> <command>.</command><percorso> Per eseguire il percorso specificato <command>..</command><percorso> Per eseguire il percorso specificato all'indietro <command>.</command> Per ripercorere i propri passi (massimo 50 locazioni) <command>..</command> Per ripercorere i propri passi all'indietro (massimo 50 locazioni)
<white>Attenzione:<reset> - Vengono memorizzate le direzioni inviate anche se il movimento nella locazione non dovesse avvenire a causa di un ostacolo. - Funziona solo con i comandi "d", "e", "n", "s", "u" e "w". - Non funziona con il comando "enter". - Non funziona con il comando "run".
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]] -- ui.help.widget = [[ <title>Ripristino dei widget chiusi</title> E' possibile ripristinare i widget dell'UI che sono stati minimizzati o chiusi.
<white>Utilizzo:<reset> <command>uiw[idget] <nome_widget></command>
I <command><nome_widget></command> disponibili sono: <exec uiwidget all>all</exec> (per tutti contemporaneamente), <exec uiwidget affect>affect</exec>, <exec uiwidget buttons>buttons</exec>, <exec uiwidget equipment>equipment</exec>, <exec uiwidget group>group</exec>, <exec uiwidget inventory>inventory</exec>, <exec uiwidget map>map</exec>, <exec uiwidget mapper>mapper</exec>, <exec uiwidget opponent>opponent</exec>, <exec uiwidget private>private</exec>, <exec uiwidget player>player</exec>, <exec uiwidget public>public</exec> o <exec uiwidget target>target</exec> per i relativi widgets.
Ritorna alla pagina principale dell'<link help>help</link>. ]]

Script.name: Init Widgets
Script.script: -- -- GMCP gmcp = gmcp or {} gmcp.MSDP = gmcp.MSDP or {} -- -- Check if the generic_mapper package is installed and if so uninstall it if table.contains(getPackages(),"generic_mapper") then ui.fDebug("[init] Unistall 'generic_mapper package") uninstallPackage("generic_mapper") end -- -- Load parameters ui.fDebug("[init] Load 'Parameters' from file") ui.parameters = ui.parameters or {} if (io.exists(ui.fileParameters)) then table.load(ui.fileParameters, ui.parameters) end ui.parameters = table.update(ui.pre_defined_parameters, ui.parameters) table.save(ui.fileParameters, ui.parameters) -- -- Load variables ui.fDebug("[init] Load 'Variables' from file") ui.fReadFileVariables() -- -- Load targets ui.fDebug("[init] Load 'Targets' from file") ui.fReadFileTargets() -- -- Load Aliases ui.fDebug("[init] Load 'Aliases' from file") ui.fReadFileAliases() -- -- Load Highlights ui.fDebug("[init] Load 'Highlights' from file") ui.fReadFileHighlights() -- -- Opponent ui.fDebug("[init] Opponent") ui.fInitOpponentWidget() -- -- Group ui.fDebug("[init] Group") ui.fInitGroupWidget() -- -- Target Buttons ui.fDebug("[init] Target Buttons") ui.fInitTargetButtonsWidget() -- -- Opponent and Groups are also targets. Widgets needed before updating ui.fUpdateAllTargetButton() ui.fUpdateTarget() ui.fUpdateOpponent() ui.fUpdateGroup() -- -- Private (Used as Log from ui.fLog()) ui.fDebug("[init] Private Chat") ui.fInitPrivateChatWidget() -- -- Player ui.fDebug("[init] Player") ui.fInitPlayerWidget() ui.fUpdatePlayer() -- -- Alias Button ui.fDebug("[init] Alias Buttons") ui.fInitAliasButtonsWidget() ui.fUpdateAllAliasButton() -- -- Affects ui.fDebug("[init] Affects") ui.fInitAffectsWidget() ui.fUpdateAffects() -- -- Map/Compass ui.fDebug("[init] Map/Compass") ui.fInitMapCompassWidget() ui.fUpdateMap() -- -- Mapper ui.fInitMapperWidget() ui.fInitMapper() -- -- Inventory ui.fDebug("[init] Inventory") ui.fInitInventoryWidget() -- -- Equipment ui.fDebug("[init] Equipment") ui.fInitEquipmentWidget() -- -- Public ui.fDebug("[init] Public Chat") ui.fInitPublicChatWidget() -- -- Help ui.fDebug("[init] Help") ui.fInitHelpWidget() GUI.Help:hide() -- -- Profile ui.fDebug("[init] Profiles") ui.fInitProfiles() -- -- GMCP ui.fDebug("[init] setMergeTables()") setMergeTables("gmcp") -- -- Events -- Resizing containers function ui.fFinishedRepositioning(eventName, containerName) local containers = { ["GUI.Affect"] = GUI.Affect, ["GUI.AliasButtons"] = GUI.AliasButtons, ["GUI.Equipment"] = GUI.Equipment, ["GUI.Group"] = GUI.Group, ["GUI.Help"] = GUI.Help, ["GUI.Inventory"] = GUI.Inventory, ["GUI.MapCompass"] = GUI.MapCompass, ["GUI.Mapper"] = GUI.Mapper, ["GUI.Opponent"] = GUI.Opponent, ["GUI.PrivateChat"] = GUI.PrivateChat, ["GUI.Player"] = GUI.Player, ["GUI.PublicChat"] = GUI.PublicChat, ["GUI.TargetButtons"] = GUI.TargetButtons, } -- if (containers[containerName]) then containers[containerName]:setAbsolute(true) -- -- For Test ui.fUpdateAffects(); ui.fUpdateGroup(); ui.fUpdateMap(); ui.fUpdateOpponent(); ui.fUpdatePlayer(); end end -- if (ui.handler_fFinishedRepositioning) then killAnonymousEventHandler(ui.handler_fFinishedRepositioning) ui.handler_fFinishedRepositioning = nil end ui.handler_fFinishedRepositioning = registerAnonymousEventHandler("AdjustableContainerRepositionFinish", ui.fFinishedRepositioning) -- -- gmcp.char ui.fDebug("[init] Register events") if (ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_char) then killAnonymousEventHandler(ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_char) ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_char = nil end ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_char = registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.char", "ui.fUpdateGMCP"); -- -- gmcp.room if (ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_room) then killAnonymousEventHandler(ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_room) ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_room = nil end ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_room = registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.room", "ui.fUpdateGMCP") -- -- gmcp.overland if (ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_overland) then killAnonymousEventHandler(ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_overland) ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_overland = nil end ui.handler_fUpdateGMCP_overland = registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.overland", "ui.fUpdateGMCP") -- ui.fDebug("[init] ... end UI init!") -- ui.fEchon("<orange> - Lumen et Umbra UI v"..ui.release.." -<white> "..ui.fGetCommandFormattedText("uih[elp]").."<white> per iniziare.")

Script.name: Other init
Script.script: ui.parameters.enablePugno = ui.parameters.enablePugno or true

Script.name: TelegramMainScript
Script.script:
-- ######################################################################### -- TODO -- * Add #COMMANDS -- * #TELEGRAM CONFIGURE -- * #TELEGRAM ENABLE/DISABLE -- * #TELEGRAM VERSION -- * #TELEGRAM HELP -- * #TELEGRAM UPDATE -- * #HELP -- * #VERSION -- * #ABOUT -- ######################################################################### -- Telegram configure -- -> collect and store Token and update interval -- -> also allow setting a char name, or use Profile Name -- -> also allowed "senders" -- local url_versionDownload = "https://github.com/takilara/MudletTelegramConnector/releases/latest/download/version.lua" local url_latestVersion = "https://github.com/takilara/MudletTelegramConnector/releases/latest/download/" local URL_GETUPDATES=nil local URL_SENDMESSAGE=nil local lineBuffer = {} local current_message_id = -1 local current_chat_id = -1 -- Telegram = Telegram or {} Telegram.Version = "v0.0.4" Telegram.PackageName = "Telegram Connector" Telegram.downloadPath = getMudletHomeDir().."/telegram downloads/" Telegram.Options = {} Telegram.MyName = "lep" -- Telegram.MyName or getProfileName() Telegram.UpdateInterval = Telegram.UpdateInterval or 10 -- seconds Telegram.Enabled = Telegram.Enabled or true Telegram.Enabled = true Telegram.EventHandlerIds = Telegram.EventHandlerIds or {} Telegram.AliasHandlerIds = Telegram.AliasHandlerIds or {} Telegram.URL = "https://api.telegram.org/bot" Telegram.getReturnHandler = Telegram.getReturnHandler or nil Telegram.getUpdateTimerId = Telegram.getUpdateTimerId or nil Telegram.LastIdHandled = Telegram.LastIdHandled or -1 --Telegram.LastIdHandled = -1 function Telegram:SaveConfig() cecho("Saving Telegram config...\n") table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/telegram_options.lua", Telegram.Options) end -- function Telegram:SetToken(token) Telegram.Options["Token"] = token Telegram:UpdateUrls() end -- function Telegram:checkVersion() local path = Telegram.downloadPath .. "versions.lua" local versions = {} table.load(path, versions) local pos = table.index_of(versions, Telegram.Version) or 0 local line = "" if pos ~= 1 then line = "(online - ".. versions[1] ..")\n \t #TELEGRAM UPGRADE to upgrade" else line ="" end return line end -- function Telegram:downloadVersionFile() if not io.exists(Telegram.downloadPath) then lfs.mkdir(Telegram.downloadPath) end local filename = "versions.lua" Telegram.downloading=true downloadFile(Telegram.downloadPath .. filename, url_versionDownload) end -- function Telegram:downloadLatestVersion() cecho("Downloading the latest version of "..Telegram.PackageName) print() if not io.exists(Telegram.downloadPath) then lfs.mkdir(Telegram.downloadPath) end local filename = "TelegramConnector.mpackage" Telegram.downloading=true downloadFile(Telegram.downloadPath .. filename, url_latestVersion .. filename) end -- function Telegram:update_version() print("Update the version") Telegram:killAllExistingEventHandlers() uninstallPackage("Telegram Connector") installPackage(Telegram.downloadPath .. "TelegramConnector.mpackage") end -- function Telegram:UpdateUrls() if Telegram.Options["Token"]~=nil then URL_GETUPDATES=Telegram.URL..Telegram.Options.Token.."/getUpdates" URL_SENDMESSAGE=Telegram.URL..Telegram.Options.Token.."/sendMessage" end end -- function Telegram:LoadConfig() if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir().."/telegram_options.lua") then cecho("Loading Telegram config...\n") table.load(getMudletHomeDir().."/telegram_options.lua", Telegram.Options) -- using / is OK on Windows too. else -- save it if it doesnt exits cecho("Creating new Telegram config...\n") Telegram:DeleteConfig() Telegram:SaveConfig() Telegram:Reset() end Telegram:UpdateUrls() end -- function Telegram:HandleUserCommand(cmd,args) cmd = string.lower(cmd) local cmdA = string.split(args," ") sub_cmd = string.lower(table.remove(cmdA,1)) sub_args = table.concat(cmdA," ") if (cmd=="help") then -- Hook to global #HELP Telegram:showHelp() elseif (cmd=="version") then -- Hook to global #VERSION Telegram:showVersion() elseif (cmd=="about") then -- Hook to global #ABOUT Telegram:showAbout() -- Package specific below elseif (cmd=="telegram") then if sub_cmd=="" then Telegram:showHelp() Telegram:showStatus() elseif sub_cmd=="enable" then Telegram.Enabled = true cecho(""..Telegram.PackageName.." ENABLED\n") elseif sub_cmd=="disable" then Telegram.Enabled = false cecho(""..Telegram.PackageName.." DISABLED\n") elseif sub_cmd=="version" then Telegram:showVersion() elseif sub_cmd=="help" then Telegram:showHelp() elseif sub_cmd=="about" then Telegram:showAbout() elseif sub_cmd=="status" then Telegram:showStatus() elseif sub_cmd=="delete" then Telegram:DeleteConfig() Telegram:SaveConfig() Telegram:Reset() elseif sub_cmd=="token" then Telegram:SetToken(sub_args) Telegram:CheckConfig() Telegram:SaveConfig() elseif sub_cmd=="auth" or sub_cmd=="authorize" then Telegram:Authorize(sub_args) elseif sub_cmd=="unauth" then Telegram:UnAuthorize(sub_args) elseif sub_cmd=="interval" then Telegram:SetInterval(sub_args) elseif sub_cmd=="tell" then local msgA = string.split(sub_args," ") local username = table.remove(msgA,1) local msg = table.concat(msgA," ") Telegram:Tell(username, msg) elseif sub_cmd=="whisper" then local msgA = string.split(sub_args," ") local username = table.remove(msgA,1) local msg = table.concat(msgA," ") Telegram:Tell(username, msg, true) elseif sub_cmd=="upgrade" then Telegram:downloadLatestVersion() end end end -- function Telegram:showHelp() cecho("".. Telegram.PackageName ..":\n") cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#HELP"),"Show Helpfile(s)")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#VERSION"),"Show version(s)")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM STATUS"),"Show Telegram Status")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM TOKEN "),"Set Telegram Token")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM UPGRADE"),"Upgrade the package")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM INTERVAL "),"Set polling interval, default 10s")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM TELL "),"Send a message to a telegram user")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM WHISPER "),"Send a message to a telegram user (no notification)")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM ENABLE/DISABLE"),"Enable or Disable the package")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM AUTH "),"Authorize a Telegram user.")) cecho(string.format("%-30s- %s\n",string.format(" %s","#TELEGRAM UNAUTH "),"UnAuthorize a Telegram user.")) cecho("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n") print() end -- function Telegram:showAbout() print("Show about") end -- function Telegram:SetInterval(seconds) local s = tonumber(seconds) if s then cecho("Set Telegram polling inverval to "..s.." seconds\n") Telegram.Options.Interval=s Telegram:SaveConfig() if Telegram.getUpdateTimerId~=nil then killTimer(Telegram.getUpdateTimerId) end Telegram.getUpdateTimerId = tempTimer(Telegram.Options.Interval,[[Telegram:getUpdates()]],true) else cecho("'"..seconds.."' is not a valid interval...\n") end end -- function Telegram:Authorize(name) if Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization[name]~=nil then Telegram.Options.Authorized[name]=Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization[name] Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization[name]=nil cecho("Authorized '"..name.."' for Telegram usage. You can now also send messages using\n") cecho("#TELEGRAM TELL "..name.." \n") Telegram.SaveConfig() else cecho("'"..name.."' not pending authorization, have him/her send a message to the bot first...\n") end end -- function Telegram:UnAuthorize(name) if Telegram.Options.Authorized[name]~=nil then Telegram.Options.Authorized[name]= nil Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization[name]=nil cecho("UnAuthorized '"..name.."' for Telegram usage. \n") Telegram.SaveConfig() else cecho("'"..name.."' not authorized, nothing done...\n") end end -- function Telegram:showStatus() cecho("---------------------------- TELEGRAM CONNECTOR STATUS --------------------------------\n") Telegram:showVersion() cecho("Token: '"..Telegram.Options["Token"].."'\n") cecho("Enabled: '"..tostring(Telegram.Options.Enabled).."'\n") cecho("Polling Interval: "..Telegram.Options.Interval.." seconds\n") -- authorized cecho("Authorized:\n") local countAuthorized =0 local countPending =0 for _ in pairs(Telegram.Options.Authorized) do countAuthorized = countAuthorized + 1 end for _ in pairs(Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization) do countPending = countPending + 1 end if countAuthorized>0 then for name,v in pairs(Telegram.Options.Authorized) do cecho("\t"..name.."\n") end else cecho("\tNONE!\n") end -- pending authorization if countPending>0 then cecho("Pending Authorization:\n") for name,v in pairs(Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization) do cecho("\t"..name.."\n") end end -- ignored cecho("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n") Telegram:Reset() Telegram:CheckConfig() Telegram:getUpdates() end -- function Telegram:showVersion() local vline = Telegram:checkVersion() cecho(string.format("%-50s: %s %s\n",Telegram.PackageName,Telegram.Version,vline)) end -- function Telegram:DeleteConfig() cecho("Deleting Telegram config...\n") Telegram.Options = {} Telegram.Options.Authorized={} Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization = {} -- populate from file Telegram.Options.Enabled = true Telegram.Options.Token="" Telegram.Options.Interval=10 Telegram:UpdateUrls() end -- function Telegram:getInitialUpdates() if Telegram.Options.Enabled and Telegram.Options.Token~="" then getHTTP(URL_GETUPDATES) end end -- function Telegram:getUpdates() if Telegram.Options.Enabled and Telegram.Options.Token~="" then local header = {["Content-Type"] = "application/json"} local opts = {} opts["allowed_updates"] = {"message"} if Telegram.LastIdHandled == -1 then opts["offset"] = -2 else opts["offset"] = Telegram.LastIdHandled+1 end postHTTP(yajl.to_string(opts),URL_GETUPDATES,header) end end -- function Telegram:onHttpPost(event, ...) if event=="sysPostHttpError" then if string.find(arg[1],"telegram")~=nil then display(arg) end else local content = yajl.to_value(arg[2]) local url = arg[1] -- use this to check if this is a telegram message, and if so what type local response = arg[3] -- not sure what to use this for --if string.starts(url,Telegram.URL) then if url:starts("https://api.telegram.org") then -- we only care about telegram messages if url == URL_GETUPDATES then if content["ok"] then Telegram:ParseUpdates(content["result"]) else cecho("getUpdates was not successful, check URL\n") display(arg) end end end end end -- function Telegram:onHttpGetDone(event, ...) local content = yajl.to_value(arg[2]) local url = arg[1] -- use this to check if this is a telegram message, and if so what type local response = arg[3] -- not sure what to use this for --if string.starts(url,Telegram.URL) then if url:starts("https://api.telegram.org") then -- we only care about telegram messages if url == URL_GETUPDATES then if content["ok"] then Telegram:ParseUpdates(content["result"]) else cecho("getUpdates was not successful, check URL\n") display(arg) end else cecho("GET Not handled\n") display(url) display(contents) end end end -- function Telegram:Reset() Telegram.LastIdHandled=-1 Telegram:UpdateUrls() end -- function Telegram:onFileDownloaded(event, ...) if event == "sysDownloadDone" and Telegram.downloading then local file = arg[1] if string.ends(file,"/versions.lua") then Telegram.downloading=false Telegram:checkVersion() elseif string.ends(file,"/TelegramConnector.mpackage") then Telegram.downloading=false Telegram:update_version() end end end -- function Telegram:ParseUpdates(contents) if Telegram.LastIdHandled==-1 then print("just loaded, update lasthandled to..") for i,m in pairs(contents) do if m["message"]~=nil then if m["message"]["message_id"] then Telegram.LastIdHandled = m["message"]["message_id"] end end end print("Last id handled set to:"..Telegram.LastIdHandled) end for i,m in pairs(contents) do if m["message"]==nil then --print("system message, ignore") else local t = m["message"]["chat"]["type"] -- private or group local message_id = m["message"]["message_id"] local chat_id = m["message"]["chat"]["id"] local from_id = m["message"]["from"]["id"] local sender_id = m["message"]["from"]["id"] local cmd = m["message"]["text"] local from_username = m["message"]["from"]["username"] if message_id>Telegram.LastIdHandled then if t=="group" then -- is this message for me? cmdA = cmd:split(" ") local cmdName = string.lower(cmdA[1]) if string.find(cmdName,string.lower(Telegram.MyName))~=nil then -- remove first word table.remove(cmdA,1) cmd = table.concat(cmdA," ") else print("This command is for '"..cmdName.."', i am '"..Telegram.MyName.."', Ignore it...") cmd = nil end else -- private message, just execute it end if cmd~=nil then if Telegram:CheckAuthorized(from_username) then Telegram:HandleCommand(cmd,message_id,chat_id,from_username) else cecho("Telegram (".. from_username .." UNAUTHORIZED) has asked me to: '"..cmd.."'\n") cecho("#TELEGRAM AUTH "..from_username.." to authorize\n") cecho("#TELEGRAM IGNORE "..from_username.." to ignore future requests\n") -- add to pending approvals Telegram.Options.PendingAuthorization[from_username]=from_id local msg = ""..Telegram:HtmlEncode("Command ignored....\nUser '"..from_username.."' not authorized\n#TELEGRAM AUTH "..from_username.." in Mudlet to Authorize.").."" local retMsg = {} retMsg["chat_id"]=chat_id retMsg["text"]=msg retMsg["reply_to_message_id"]=message_id retMsg["disable_notification"]=true retMsg["parse_mode"]="HTML" current_message_id = message_id current_chat_id = chat_id Telegram:SendMessage(retMsg) Telegram.LastIdHandled = message_id end else -- just update the id Telegram.LastIdHandled = message_id end end end end end -- function Telegram:HtmlEncode(str) str = string.gsub(str,"&","&") str = string.gsub(str,"<","<") str = string.gsub(str,">",">") return str end -- function Telegram:CaptureLine(...) if isPrompt() then killTrigger(Telegram.lineTriggerId) Telegram.lineTriggerId = nil local htmlMsg = Telegram:HtmlEncode(table.concat(lineBuffer,"\n")) local retMsg = {} retMsg["chat_id"]=current_chat_id retMsg["text"]="
"..htmlMsg.."
" retMsg["reply_to_message_id"]=current_message_id retMsg["disable_notification"]=true retMsg["parse_mode"]="HTML" Telegram:SendMessage(retMsg) else -- dont add prompt table.insert(lineBuffer,line) end end -- function Telegram:Tell(username,msg,disable_notification) disable_notification = disable_notification or false if Telegram.Options.Authorized[username]~=nil then local htmlMsg = Telegram:HtmlEncode(msg) local retMsg = {} retMsg["chat_id"]= Telegram.Options.Authorized[username] retMsg["text"]=msg retMsg["disable_notification"]= disable_notification Telegram:SendMessage(retMsg) else cecho("'"..username.."' is not authorized, use:\n") cecho("#TELEGRAM AUTH "..username.."\n") end end -- function Telegram:SendMessage(msgTable) local header = {["Content-Type"] = "application/json"} Telegram:UpdateUrls() cecho("Sending to telegram...\n") postHTTP(yajl.to_string(msgTable),URL_SENDMESSAGE,header) end -- function Telegram:CheckConfig() if Telegram.Options["Token"]=="" then cecho("Token has not been set.\n") cecho("#TELEGRAM TOKEN to set..\n") end local countAuthorized = 0 for _ in pairs(Telegram.Options.Authorized) do countAuthorized = countAuthorized + 1 end -- if countAuthorized==0 then cecho("No one has been authorized. Send a message to the bot from Telegram, then!\n") cecho("#TELEGRAM AUTH \n") end end -- function Telegram:CheckAuthorized(from_username) if Telegram.Options.Authorized[from_username]==nil then return false else return true end end -- function Telegram:HandleCommand(cmd,message_id,chat_id,from_username) -- check if Authorized -- notify "On It" cecho("Telegram (".. from_username ..") has asked me to: '"..cmd.."'\n") local retMsg = {} retMsg["chat_id"]=chat_id retMsg["text"]="on it" retMsg["reply_to_message_id"]=message_id retMsg["disable_notification"]=true current_message_id = message_id current_chat_id = chat_id Telegram:SendMessage(retMsg) -- start capture lineBuffer = {} -- enable line trigger if Telegram.lineTriggerId then killTrigger(Telegram.lineTriggerId) Telegram.lineTriggerId = nil end Telegram.lineTriggerId = tempLineTrigger(0,99,[[Telegram:CaptureLine()]]) -- send command expandAlias(cmd) -- update last handled Telegram.LastIdHandled = message_id -- stop Capture -- send last 3 lines back return true end -- function Telegram:killAllExistingEventHandlers() -- kill all dynamic handlers -- ... events for i,handlerId in pairs(Telegram.EventHandlerIds) do if tonumber(handlerId) then killAnonymousEventHandler(handlerId) Telegram.EventHandlerIds[i]= nil end end -- ... Aliases for i,handlerId in pairs(Telegram.AliasHandlerIds) do --print("Should remove alias "..handlerId) if tonumber(handlerId) then killAlias(handlerId) Telegram.AliasHandlerIds[i]= nil end end if Telegram.getReturnHandler~=nil then killAnonymousEventHandler(Telegram.getReturnHandler) end if Telegram.getUpdateTimerId~=nil then killTimer(Telegram.getUpdateTimerId) end end -- Init --Telegram:killAllExistingEventHandlers() -- setup dynamic eventHandlers --table.insert(Telegram.EventHandlerIds,registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysPostHttpDone", [[Telegram:onHttpPost]])) --table.insert(Telegram.EventHandlerIds,registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysPostHttpError", [[Telegram:onHttpPost]])) --table.insert(Telegram.EventHandlerIds,registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadDone", [[Telegram:onFileDownloaded]])) --table.insert(Telegram.AliasHandlerIds,tempAlias([[^#(?i)(\btelegram\b|\bhelp\b|\bversion\b|\babout\b)(?-i)\s*(.*)$]],[[Telegram:HandleUserCommand(matches[2],matches[3])]])) --for i,handlerId in pairs(Telegram.AliasHandlerIds) do -- if tonumber(handlerId) then -- enableAlias(handlerId) -- end --end -- manual handlers --Telegram.getReturnHandler = registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysGetHttpDone", [[Telegram:onHttpGetDone]]) --Telegram:downloadVersionFile() --Telegram:LoadConfig() --Telegram.getUpdateTimerId = tempTimer(Telegram.Options.Interval,[[Telegram:getUpdates()]],true) --Telegram:CheckConfig() --Telegram:getInitialUpdates()

Script.name: sendToDiscordWebhook
Script.script:
function sendToDiscordWebhook(message) local httpdone = registerAnonymousEventHandler('sysPostHttpDone', function(event, rurl, response) if rurl == url then display(r) else return true end end, true) -- local httperror = registerAnonymousEventHandler('sysPostHttpError', function(event, response, rurl) if rurl == url then display(r) else return true end end, true) -- local url = "https://discord.com/api/webhooks/1069019910606430298/C38n1RlUOmsQq3q1fqwbOllc8gG9SUu2SfWK3sjBlGDmpBQV4YdcE4sPuVBHegeTnDmU" -- local data = { username = "Invasione [by Kyrus]", avatar_url = "https://s3.amazonaws.com/grapevine-haus/games/46/cover/thumbnail-054bf964-d5ae-4b54-8dc8-63cb85a87538.png", content = message }
local header = { ["Content-Type"] = "application/json", } -- postHTTP(yajl.to_string(data), url, header) killAnonymousEventHandler(httpdone) killAnonymousEventHandler(httperror) end

Script.name: luogotenenti
Script.script:
function getPosition(direzione) if direzione == 'sud' then return 2 elseif direzione == 'est' then return 6 elseif direzione == 'nord' then return 8 elseif direzione == 'ovest' then return 4 elseif direzione == 'sud-ovest' then return 1 elseif direzione == 'sud-est' then return 3 elseif direzione == 'nord-est' then return 9 elseif direzione == 'nord-ovest' then return 7 elseif direzione == 'centro' then return 5 end end -- function sposta(direction) local actualPosition = ui.variables.roomPos or 5 if (actualPosition==direction) then cecho("
<white:green>Movimento non necessario. Sei gia' in ("..actualPosition..")<reset>",false) else if (actualPosition == 1) and (direction == 4 or direction == 2) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 2) and (direction == 1 or direction == 3) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 3) and (direction == 2 or direction == 6) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 4) and (direction == 1 or direction == 7) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 5) or (direction == 5) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 6) and (direction == 3 or direction == 9) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 7) and (direction == 4 or direction == 8) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 8) and (direction == 6 or direction == 7) then onestepmove=true elseif (actualPosition == 9) and (direction == 6 or direction == 8) then onestepmove=true else onestepmove=false end
if onestepmove then cecho("
<white:orange>Movimento veloce da ("..actualPosition..") a ("..direction..")<reset>
",false) send("sposta "..direction, true) else cecho("
<white:red>Movimento lento da ("..actualPosition..") a (5) a ("..direction..")<reset>
",false) send("sposta 5", true) send("sposta "..direction, true) end end end
